12.1.hd_quote: Withdrawal that can only be maintained with communal support.
12.1.behavioral_axis: Holds back expression until inner timing is correct.

12.2.hd_quote: Purify yourself from all negative forces.
12.2.behavioral_axis: Withdraws to cleanse influences before opening.

12.3.hd_quote: The expression of inadequacies in social interaction that leads to self-analysis and caution.
12.3.behavioral_axis: Learns through missteps; builds careful expression.

12.4.hd_quote: The 12.4 is The Prophet, the arousing of the stagnant.
12.4.behavioral_axis: Senses when a group can receive mutation.

12.5.hd_quote: The success of restraint lies in not abandoning the lessons learnt when the phase ends.
12.5.behavioral_axis: Carries forward learned restraint between waves.
12.5.shadow_axis: Appears endlessly available; over-asked by others.

12.6.hd_quote: The capacity to mutate and express new social forms.
12.6.behavioral_axis: Models the new social pattern through expression.
12.6.shadow_axis: Resigns to standstill; disengages from the field.
